original_text: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies; and, behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah, who were carried away to Babylon for their transgression.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 그 계보대로 계수되어 그들은 이스라엘 왕조실록에 기록되니라 유다가 범죄함으로 말미암아 바벨론으로 사로잡혀 갔더니

sentences.original_text: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모든 이스라엘은 족보에 따라 계산되었고

sentences.original_text: and, behold, they were written in the book
of the kings of Israel and Judah
who were carried away to Babylon
